caption.title: Left: Location of the Yuchisi site and YC1 profile in relation to local river systems (inset map shows the location of the study area in China).
caption.p: Right: Stratigraphy, chronology, and cultural context of the studied sedimentary deposit 21. The map was created with ArcGIS 10.3.1 ( http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis).
